experience.description: Handle the company's social media platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter. Create and schedule posts for the company's social media platforms. Create and update the company's website using WordPress.
Accountable for freshness of all baked products, ensure accuracy in food production report and wastage reports, inform restaurant manager for running out products.
Accountable for daily shift, oversees all employees are practicing proper food handling practices, ensures store is clean before endorsement and tracking of daily wastages.
Accountable for daily operations, ensure proper food handling is always practiced, monthly reports, yearly reporting, and ensure customer satisfaction.
